analysis.key_quote: Simply increasing the ability for a federal employee to be fired doesn't guarantee that there will be any actual improvement in their job performance, it really only guarantees that they will learn what rules they have to follow and then your that line as much as possible to keep their job.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the potential for politicization of the civil service and the lack of guarantees for nonpartisan performance, indicating opposition to the proposed rule.
